display_name: Calculated - RDI in non-supine body position (>= 3% desaturation)
description: missing if studies with problems scoring REM/NREM or if studies scored as sleep/wake or REM sleep time is 1
calculation: 60*(hrop3 + hnrop3 + carop3 + canop3 + oarop3 + oanop3 + marop3 + manrop3)/(remepop+nremepop)
